title.rendered: AVS – Your first choice for Safety, Military & Industrial Shoes

content.rendered:
Footwear, a garment worn to protect the feet, is now one of the major sources of the world’s economy. Global and local footwear manufacturers and suppliers are offering a vast variety of footwear that can be worn for different purposes. Amongst this, the specialized footwear industry is expecting huge growth in the coming years which required the best Military and Industrial Shoes supplier.

Shoes that are worn in hazardous working environments by labourers/industry workers and in difficult weather conditions by army personnel are in high demand. Moreover, this specialized shoe industry is expected to grow at a rapid rate in the next few years.

Military Footwear Industry

With an increase in demand for the safety of the soldiers, while patrolling streets or performing combat training, the defence forces of various countries are now ordering army shoes. It is because military activities are intensifying and more civilians are becoming army shoe enthusiasts, the military footwear industry are growing.

According to a study, the military footwear industry will be witnessing a tremendous growth at a CAGR of approx.10% in the next 4 years. It is expected to reach 4590 million US$ in 2024 from 2600 million US$ in 2019. Many major market players are offering a versatile range of these shoes in the global market.

Amongst these, AVS International is the best Military and Industrial Shoes Supplier across the globe.

What makes AVS the right choice for Safety, Military, and Industrial Shoes?

  • Protection. We keep focus on providing safety in the first place. Whether it’s any hazardous working environment or a difficult climatic condition, our safety shoes and army shoes are designed in such a manner that they protect the feet from getting hurt.

    The shoes manufactured by AVS International have different features which include heat, water, and oil resistance thus providing safety to the wearer.
  • Quality. At AVS International no compromise is done when it comes to the quality of army and industrial shoes. The footwear industry is full of suppliers who provide an inferior quality product to the customers at less price.

    But AVS being a reputed brand is continuously evolving and innovating ways to improve the quality of these shoes. We use standard varieties of materials and components to manufacture high-grade safety shoes and army shoes.
  • Durability. The buyers always think of purchasing footwear that will last long. For this purpose, we aim at serving our clients with highly durable footwear products.

    Many of our products are made of quality leather that provides shock absorption. Also, the safety and army shoes are made of the directly moulded sole, rubber sole, or of canvas material needing low-maintenance.
  • Comfort. Another thing that bothers a buyer’s mind is the comfort they need while wearing footwear. Cushioned padding, appropriate heel, and flexible soles that provide breathing space for the feet are a few aspects that we work upon to design more comfortable shoes.
  • Variety. Its a general myth that army shoes and industrial shoes are similar and come in limited designs. But, with a wide variety of these shoes we at AVS International, offer you different styles of the army and safety shoes. It’s no wonder that these shoes are now also becoming a part of fashion trends and being worn by locals as well.

We deliver quality and quantity at the same time which makes AVS International – Best Military and Industrial Shoes Supplier

Top Models of Safety Shoes and Military Shoes at AVS International:

  • Leather shoes for ladies. Used for protecting the feet as well as for being a fashion trend, these are specially designed for ladies. Made of leather, these shoes are durable and comfortable that allows the feet to breathe.
  • DMS Boot (Canvas). Perfect for use in different environmental conditions, these boots contain a directly moulded sole with canvas material that is water-repellent.
  • Jodhpuri (Rubber Sole). Suitable for workers in manufacturing, mining, petrochemical, and hot surface industries, this footwear has a rubber sole and is heat-resistant.
  • Fuel Boot. (Rubber Sole). Specially designed for safety purposes, this footwear has a sole made of rubber and is water-resistant.
  • Long Boot. This footwear is suitable for both men and women who need to protect their feet while working in extreme weather conditions.
  • Eyelet Boot (DMS) These shoes provide space for laces and are made of directly moulded sole mainly used by miners, army, police, and defence forces.

Our USP:

We aim at providing quality and cost-efficient products that include safety shoes and army shoes. The following features make our products stand out:

Safety Shoe:

  • Water-repellent
  • Oil and fuel resistant
  • Heat resistant
  • Steel-toe cap
  • Shock-absorption

Army Shoe:

  • Anti-Skid
  • Anti-static sole
  • Heat resistant
  • Shock absorber
  • Oil resistant
  • Waterproof
  • Steel-toe

These safety shoes and army shoes can be used for multiple purposes. As they are heavy duty and anti-skid, they are also used by the police force, medical scientists, constructors, miners, chemists, and also by any individual as part of their everyday wardrobe.

Footwear Industry

Being a creator of employment opportunities and paying wages to millions of employees all over the world, the footwear industry is about to grow shortly.

Although Covid-19 has affected the business it has made manufacturers and suppliers reform their business processes. It has paved a way for them to reach out to the target audience in a different way following a different approach.

Everybody’s now shifting to e-commerce websites and online platforms. AVS International being present on these platforms for a long time is making their products available for you that are just a tap away.
